mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.loc_code AS "locCode", a.zone_code AS "zoneCode", a.status AS "status", a.is_enable AS "isEnable", a.category AS "category", a.loc_use_type AS "locUseType", a.pa_seq AS "paSeq", a.pk_seq AS "pkSeq", a.abc AS "abc", a.length AS "length", a.width AS "width", a.height AS "height", a.lane AS "lane", a.seq AS "seq", a.floor AS "floor", a.loc_group AS "locGroup", a.is_mix_sku AS "isMixSku", a.max_mix_sku AS "maxMixSku", a.is_mix_lot AS "isMixLot", a.max_mix_lot AS "maxMixLot", a.is_lose_id AS "isLoseId", a.max_weight AS "maxWeight", a.max_cubic AS "maxCubic", a.max_pl AS "maxPl", a.x AS "x", a.y AS "y", a.z AS "z", a.def1 AS "def1", a.def2 AS "def2", a.def3 AS "def3", a.def4 AS "def4", a.def5 AS "def5", a.def6 AS "def6", a.def7 AS "def7", a.def8 AS "def8", a.def9 AS "def9", a.def10 AS "def10", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.rec_ver AS "recVer", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.org_id AS "orgId", z.zone_name AS "zoneName"
LEFT JOIN cd_wh_zone z ON a.zone_code = z.zone_code AND a.org_id = z.org_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cd_wh_loc( id, loc_code, zone_code, status, is_enable, category, loc_use_type, pa_seq, pk_seq, abc, length, width, height, lane, seq, floor, loc_group, is_mix_sku, max_mix_sku, is_mix_lot, max_mix_lot, is_lose_id, max_weight, max_cubic, max_pl, x, y, z, def1, def2, def3, def4, def5, def6, def7, def8, def9, def10, remarks, rec_ver, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, org_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{locCode}, #{zoneCode}, #{status}, #{isEnable}, #{category}, #{locUseType}, #{paSeq}, #{pkSeq}, #{abc}, #{length}, #{width}, #{height}, #{lane}, #{seq}, #{floor}, #{locGroup}, #{isMixSku}, #{maxMixSku}, #{isMixLot}, #{maxMixLot}, #{isLoseId}, #{maxWeight}, #{maxCubic}, #{maxPl}, #{x}, #{y}, #{z}, #{def1}, #{def2}, #{def3}, #{def4}, #{def5}, #{def6}, #{def7}, #{def8}, #{def9}, #{def10}, #{remarks}, #{recVer}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{orgId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE cd_wh_loc SET loc_code = #{locCode}, zone_code = #{zoneCode}, status = #{status}, is_enable = #{isEnable}, category = #{category}, loc_use_type = #{locUseType}, pa_seq = #{paSeq}, pk_seq = #{pkSeq}, abc = #{abc}, length = #{length}, width = #{width}, height = #{height}, lane = #{lane}, seq = #{seq}, floor = #{floor}, loc_group = #{locGroup}, is_mix_sku = #{isMixSku}, max_mix_sku = #{maxMixSku}, is_mix_lot = #{isMixLot}, max_mix_lot = #{maxMixLot}, is_lose_id = #{isLoseId}, max_weight = #{maxWeight}, max_cubic = #{maxCubic}, max_pl = #{maxPl}, x = #{x}, y = #{y}, z = #{z}, def1 = #{def1}, def2 = #{def2}, def3 = #{def3}, def4 = #{def4}, def5 = #{def5}, def6 = #{def6}, def7 = #{def7}, def8 = #{def8}, def9 = #{def9}, def10 = #{def10}, remarks = #{remarks}, rec_ver = #{recVer} + 1, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id} AND rec_ver = #{recVer}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cd_wh_loc WHERE loc_code = #{locCode} AND org_id = #{orgId}
